disabled.description: If pill is disabled it has higher contrast to be visible on the disabled input background and the remove button is hidden
disabled.description_zh: 如果禁用 pill，则它在禁用的输入背景上具有更高的可见对比度，并且 remove 按钮处于隐藏状态

onRemove.description: Called when the remove button is clicked

radius.description: Key of theme.radius or any valid CSS value to set border-radius. Numbers are converted to rem. 'xl' by default.
radius.description_zh: key） 或任何用于设置 border-radius 的有效 CSS 值。默认情况下，数字转换为 rem. 'xl'。

removeButtonProps.description: Props passed down to the remove button
removeButtonProps.description_zh: 传递给 remove 按钮的 props

size.description: Controls pill font-size and padding, 'sm' by default
size.description_zh: 控制 pill font-size 和 padding，默认为 'sm'

withRemoveButton.description: Determines whether the remove button should be displayed, false by default
withRemoveButton.description_zh: 确定是否应显示删除按钮，默认为 false
